states

Interface IState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StateAdapter, WaitAnswer, WaitConfiguration, WaitScore

    public interface IState
    IState = InterfaceState This interface contains all methods used in the state machine. This methods should only be implemented if needed on each state. All javadoc is declared on the State Adapter, because that is going to be the class that every state will extend.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IState end()
      This action represents the end of a challenge by answering all questions.
      IState newGame()
      Start a new challenge.
      IState nextAnswer(Answer answer)
      Move to next answer.
      IState quitGame()
      If user wants to quit challenge this method should be called.
      IState startGame(java.util.List<Challenge.Categories> categoryList)
      After challenge configurations are set, to start game use this method.

    • Method Detail

      • newGame

        IState newGame()
        Start a new challenge.
        Returns:
        WaitConfiguration

      • startGame

        IState startGame(java.util.List<Challenge.Categories> categoryList)
        After challenge configurations are set, to start game use this method.
        Parameters:
        categoryList - list of categories.
        Returns:
        WaitAnswer if configurations are correct. Returns this if there's invalid configurations.

      • quitGame

        IState quitGame()
        If user wants to quit challenge this method should be called. No data is saved if this method is called.
        Returns:
        WaitConfiguration

      • nextAnswer

        IState nextAnswer(Answer answer)
        Move to next answer.
        Parameters:
        answer - Represents the answer chosen by the user.
        Returns:
        this if challenge isn't over. WaitScore if challenge is over.

      • end

        IState end()
        This action represents the end of a challenge by answering all questions. Challenge data is stored.
        Returns:
        WaitScore
